content.question: Based on the mass spectrum of a pure element represented above, the average atomic mass of the element is closest to which of the following?

choices.label: <math alttext="185.7 a m u" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>185.7</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.20em"></mspace><mtext>amu</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="186.3 a m u" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>186.3</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.20em"></mspace><mtext>amu</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="186.3 a m u" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>186.3</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.20em"></mspace><mtext>amu</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 5.D: Identify information presented graphically to solve a problem.
